Top_Description: A pool of 40,000+ of the best talent at your fingertips!
WhoWeAre_Description1: We connect global workforces to create value for the businesses of tomorrow.
WhoWeAre_Description2: Functioning as the talent acquisition branch of Swivel Group, Swivel Talent has perfected the art of recruitment. Our team formulates a thorough 6-step strategy for hiring the best talent in the market by designing job grading, job description, and salary benchmarking. This guarantees we will source the right candidates to complete your job!
